TopicTitle: IÃ‚Â´m circumnavigating Kerbin on a Rover - Completed August 24, 2014

Articles.Content:
We planted a flag on the South Pole!

You can follow the unfolding events on youtube, this is the latest uploaded video

Out of the South Pole and into the Antarctic thundra throug the mountains wearing a weird hat, closing the distance to my final destination: The Kerbal Space Center Flagpole.

You can follow these events on youtube, this is the latest uploaded video
Neat idea for your next series. Looking forward to it.
Love these videos, it reminds me that the game is more than just flying to other worlds, there's a ton of surface exploration too!

Today I finished my challenge to circumnavigate Kerbin by land, no mods, no hacks, only stock. Started roving north from the KSC on January 24, 2014, went over both poles, one ocean, two islands, leaving behind 74 EVA Kerbals and 74 flags, reaching the KSC from the south today August 10, 2014.

This is the final episode

Like I said, I'm a pretty new subscriber, but I really like this series, even if I haven't watched all of it because I haven't got a lot of time at the moment. Great to find you here at the forums! Keep up the great work!
Awesome! I've watched a few of your rovering vids in the not-so-distant past, got you queued up now in the old "Watch Later" to watch the rest. Looking forward to it!
